item.title: M38 TWS Wireless Gaming Headsets
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description:
M38 TWS Wireless In-ear Noise Cancelling Gaming Headsets

✅ Bluetooth chip: Lanxun 5616 ✅ Bluetooth version: 5.1 ✅ Earbuds battery capacity: 50mAh ✅ Charging compartment battery capacity: 1200mAh ✅ Working hours: 12 hours ✅ Standby time: 220 hours ✅ Operation Mode: Touch ✅ Waterproof grade: IPX7 ✅ Battery voltage：3.7V ✅ Input voltage:5V ✅ Transmission distance:≥10m ✅ Speaker:20-20khz ✅ Bluetooth operating frequency:2.402-2.48Ghz

item.title: Noise Cancelling Wireless Neckband
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description:
Wireless Neckband Bluetooth Headphones Waterproof Noise Cancelling with LED Display.

✅ Bluetooth receiving range: 10 meters ✅ Bluetooth version: 5.2 ✅ Noise Reduction Version: CVC8.0 ✅ Frequency response: 20Hz~20kHz ✅ Impedance: 32Ω ✅ Driver Diameter: 10mm ✅ Battery capacity: 300mAh ✅ Call playback time: about 10 hours ✅ Power input: DC5V/1A ✅ Charging time: 2 hours

item.title: T75 Ear Mounted Bluetooth Headphones
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description:
T75 Ear Mounted Bone Conduction TWS Bluetooth Headset

✅ Bluetooth version：5.3 ✅ Support protocol：A2DP/HFP/SPP/HID/PBAP ✅ Bluetooth range：10-15m ✅ Battery capacity：50mA ✅ Charging box battery capacity：400mAh ✅ Charging time：About 1 h ✅ Call&playing time：About 5 h ✅ Speaker size：10mm ✅ MIC Sensitivity: -42dB±3dB ✅ Frequency response：40Hz-20KHz ✅ Impedance：32Ω ✅ Sensitivity：106±3dB ✅ Charging specification：5V/1A ✅ Operating voltage：3.7V-4.2V

item.title: PQ3 Bone Conduction Wireless Earphones
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description:
PQ3 Bone Conduction Wireless Bluetooth Earphones MINI TWS Ear Clip

✅ Bluetooth version: V5.3 ✅ Talk time: about 6 hours ✅ Music playing: about 6 hours ✅ Standby time: 80 hours ✅ Communication distance:>10M ✅ Charging time of headset: about 1 hour ✅ Headphone battery capacity: 30mAH ✅ Battery capacity of charging chamber: 300mAH ✅ Frequency characteristic: 2.40GHz - 2.48GHz ✅ Support protocol: A2DP1.3/HFP1.6/HSP1.2AVRCP1.6/D11.3
item.content:encoded:
Multiple use key

Pause/Play: Click MFB
Previous song: double-click the MFB key on the L side
Next song: double-click the MFB key on the R side
Volume increase: three clicks on the L side
Volume key: three clicks on the R side
Answer the call: Double-click MFB
Hang up the phone: double click the MFB key
Incoming call rejection: long press MFB key for 2 seconds
Cancel call: double click MFB key
Call Siri: click the left or right MFB key three times when the song is not playing
Cancel Siri: Double click the left or right MFB key

item.title: BOYA M1 Microphone
item.dc:creator: smb007ahs1
item.description:
BOYA M1 Microphone For Smartphone, DSLR, Laptop & PC

✅ First Copy [not original brand] ✅ Brand: Boya ✅ Model Number: Boya BY-M1 ✅ Transducer: Electret Condenser ✅ Polar pattern: Omnidirectional ✅ Frequency Range: 65Hz ~ 18 KHz ✅ Signal/Noise: 74dB SPL ✅ Sensitivity: -30dB +/- 3dB / 0dB=1V/Pa, 1 kHz ✅ Output Impedance: 1000 Ohm or less ✅ Connector: 3.5mm (1/8”) 4-pole gold plug ✅ Battery Type: LR44 ✅ Dimensions: Microphone: 18.00mmH x 8.30mmW x 8.30mmD ✅ Cable: 6.0m
